English: Armoured units allow real projection of power on the battlefield. Their speed and firepower make them lethal against all but the best entrenched Infantry. However, as tanks become heavier, their speeds will reduce accordingly.  They also require a constant supply of fuel to remain in the field and if this vital supply is severed, the armoured unit will be almost useless.
French: Les unités blindées vous permettent de manifester directement votre puissance sur le champ de bataille. Leur vitesse et leur puissance de feu sont fatales aux unités d’infanteries non retranchées. Toutefois, le poids croissant des chars réduit d’autant leur vitesse. D’autre part ils nécessitent un réapprovisionnement constant en carburant pour rester opérationnels. Si cette ressource vitale venait à s’épuiser les unités blindées deviendraient totalement inutiles.

La loro velocità e la potenza di fuoco le rendono letali contro qualsiasi unità, a parte la fanteria trincerata. Man mano che i carri armati diventano più pesanti, la loro rapidità di movimento si riduce di conseguenza. Queste unità richiedono un rifornimento regolare di carburante per rimanere in campo: qualora venisse a mancare, diverrebbero quasi inutili.

Par ailleurs les canons légers de ces navires sont utiles pour éloigner les menaces aériennes. Its ability to project power through the aircraft it carries makes it dangerous to other capital ships and land forces. However, the ship itself is only lightly armed and must rely on other naval units, as well as its own aircraft, to afford it protection.

English: The Submarine is designed to travel underwater allowing it to operate clandestinely against other naval units. Its main armament consists of torpedoes which are deadly against all other types of vessel, be they Carrier, Battleship, Naval Transport or another Submarine. However, the Submarine can be handicapped by a short range and new technologies to improve them can be expensive.

English: The Rocket or Ballistic Missile (e.g. the German V2) is designed to deliver a payload of explosives to a distant target. Its high speed makes it almost impossible to intercept but it is an expensive way of destroying the enemy with conventional explosives.  Nuclear weapons are needed to give it more than psychological effect.
